price: 26. À Allah appartient tout ce qui est dans les cieux et sur terre. Allah est Celui Qui se passe de toute chose, et Il est Digne de Toute Louange.
arabic: لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
